William intentionally enlarged thanks 2 the school bus

13555512.content:
You chose


William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

And specifically for little William Li to become

Now the question is the circumstances of
How William gets BIG and to start the story
13555512.title: William Li becomes William Large

choices: Growing up - clothes grow too - reader version
Growing up - outgrowing clothes and more
135555121.content:
William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

———-

This is more a retelling or alternative version
of the storyline from the episode.


William had just shrunken Miss Frizzle’s class
with the “Port-A-Shrinker” thinking it was a toy
then fired a shot that went out the window and
shrank the school bus too.


He then dropped the device temporarily distracted
by something else.
The distraction didn’t last long and he started
walking towards the shrunken class.

“Izzle! Anda!”

As he walked towards them he stepped
on that “Port-A-Shrinker” breaking it.

“Uh oh” he said.

Suddenly with his foot still on the broken
damaged device it started to spark then
zapped him with a different color beam
than normal.

The odd colored energy surrounded and
spread all over his body.

“HeeHee ickle weird” he laughed unaware of
the seriousness of what happened.

The energy and glow soon faded.
Oddly William seemed unaffected.


“Huh well that doesn’t seem right” noted
Mizz Frizzle.


Next William started walking away.

Frizz called Liz
“Liz while we work on getting back to
the bus and unshrunk you’re in charge and
gonna have to take care of William”

Liz looked nervous but obeyed


——
A/N ok now I’m going to let the reader/writers
choose if Williams clothes grow with him or not
as well as other factors
135555121.title: William and the Port-A-Shrinker in reverse

1355551211.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...
——

Liz looked nervous but obeyed and followed
after William.


Suddenly Liz noticed William glow.
Then he grew clothes and all 6 inches taller
and larger keeping the same proportions
all over.


“HeeHee ickle feel gud”

Liz got nervous and ran panicked to try and
tell the class what happened.
The class was now in the bathroom looking
for things to help them get out of the house in
their shrunken state.

Liz was about to warn them when the now
taller William pushed the bathroom door shut
having followed Liz.


“HeeHee Wiz Pway fun” said
William picking up the distraught lizard.

William walked back to the living room with
Liz and the class had to change their plans.

Some time later William’s mom came to
check on him.
She didn’t see Wanda or the class that had
offered to help but William seemed ok.

Then she got another work call.
She was swamped with work and calls.


As she was about to answer another
call she paused.

’Did William seem... taller?’
she mused to herself but didn’t look back
assuming it to be her imagination from
work stress.

As she walked away she didn’t notice
Willam glow again but the distraught Liz did.

This time Willam gained another 14 inches
in height.

“HeeHee ickle funny feel gud”

This time after growing William was getting
thirsty.

“Firsty wan ink”

Liz understood someone and rushed him a
baby bottle.

“Yay wiz ing dwink”
Then as William began to drink much to
Liz’s dismay William glowed again.

This time William added another 2 feet in
height and size becoming as tall as his
mother but he was too busy drinking to
notice the tickle this time.


Liz was freakin out then things got worse.
With William’s increased size that meant a
few things.

# 1 he drank his bottle faster due to being
larger while the bottle hadn’t changed size.

# 2 being bigger apparently meant a bigger
thirst.

He soon finished the bottle and was still
thirsty.

# 3 Like his thirst his hunger increased too
as evident by the stomach growl

“Dwink gun me still firsty an hungy”

William however was too impatient for
help. He wobbly walked to the kitchen
and didn’t understand why or what was
happening but as Liz gave chase
William noticed he could reach some things
now.


William opened the fridge and began
raiding it.
He pulled out 3 apple juice boxes and
made quick work of them.

Next he pulled out a jug of chocolate
milk and downed that.

Suddenly William glowed again as a
helpless Liz looked on.

His growth spurts seemed to be getting
bigger but still spaced around 15 to 35 minutes
apart at random.

This time William swelled 4 feet taller now
topping out around 10 feet tall.

Again William was too distracted.
His thirst again persisted as did his hunger.


Next William chugged a gallon of OJ
then cranberry juice.
Next William found a couple baby bottles
of milk and a couple of baby formula and
finished those off.

Lastly he had 2 bottles of water.

His thirst quenched next was food!
He ate an entire 6 pack of chocolate pudding!


He ate 2 jars of Apple sauce, a container
of cottage cheese, half a chocolate cake,
2 things of baby food, a slice of pie, and
a couple of brownies.

Satisfied William was now back to his
curious self and felt the urge to explore.


He walked out of the kitchen and then
explored the house a bit a distraught Liz
giving chase. Soon he’s bored though
and spots the door to the backyard.


Now that he can reach it he opens it
and goes outside much to more displeasure
for Liz.

Fortunately it was a darn good thing
that he had gone outside lest his
mom notice something was up but also
because again Liz watched as within
mere moments of entering the backyard
William glowed again.


Liz facepalmed as William swelled clothes
and all to 18 feet tall.

“HeeHee big ickle feel gud” he giggled
as this time the feeling was stronger and
lasted longer.

Fortunately the 3 1/2 floor house was still
larger than William.


William then sat down and began to
play with one of his mothers meditation
yoga ball things which now to William wasn’t
quite as big anymore.

Liz relaxed just a bit.

Meanwhile Wanda and the class had just
reached a window in the house but had
to devise a way to get it open.
1355551211.title: Growing Up - reserved - clothed version

choices: A wandering big Willy - Part 2- reserved-
13555512111.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

——-

William had played with the ball for quite
some time and Liz was beginning to
relax hoping things had calmed down.


Alas Liz had jinxed it!
William began to glow again then as
the glow faded he swelled larger.

Bigger and bigger William grew this time
swelling to 35 feet tall.
Liz was slightly concerned cause
the tall tot was barefooted but then shook
his/her head realizing there’s more important
things to worry about.


Willam stood up and finally noticed slightly
things were different only being so young
not in the correct way even though he was
literally only slight shorter than his house.


“Ooo tings oook whiddle lots twoys”

Liz began to panic! William thought this was
playtime or a game and things toys?
What’s worse is his growing spurts
weren’t stopping.


Willam looked around.
Liz hopes up and down trying to mime
instructions to stay put.
At first it worked as William watched the tiny
dancing lizard and sucked his thumb a bit.


However the interest didn’t last long.
Willam turned around and walked wobbly
to the backyard fence leaving slightly large
footprints in the yard.

He then lifted one leg over the fence then
the other. Now in a neighbors yard.
Liz panicked and with difficulties followed after.


Willam then walked thru said neighbors yard
then went over yet another fence.
Then walked thru a 3rd yard and over a 3rd
fence.


In the 4th yard he stopped.
Fortunately things were shockingly quiet
and deserted so he was unseen not that
he was concerned.

William was thirsty again.

“Firsty wan dwink”

Then he spotted a small kiddie pool with water.
To him it was like a bowl.


He walked over to it and picked it up.


Meanwhile at Wanda’s house the shrunken
class had just gotten the bathroom window
open enough to get out of but now had to
get down, go thru the yard and get to the bus.


Inside Wanda and William’s mom had just
finished another 2 back to back calls while
working hard from home.
She came to check on William only to see
him gone.

“Huh I guess Wanda and her friends took
Willam out for a bit! That’s a relief”

Just then her phones were ringing again
and thus she remained blissfully unaware of
her growing boy.



Back with William, Liz had nearly caught up.
William was slurping down the water from
the kiddy pool he had found.


William had just finished the water in the
pool when Liz had gotten over the fence.
William then dropped the pool and was ready
to move on.


He crossed the rest of the yard and climbed
over yet another fence.

Now William was on the outskirts of a
wooded area. Liz was actually happy that
William wasn’t headed towards a populated
area at present.


William stepped forward with curiosity.
the woods looked large even to him.
In truth it was some large woods.
Also most trees towered over him.
They ranged from a few feet taller to
2, 3, 4 or even 5x his current size.


As Willam entered the woods down a path
he stopped

“Ooo lotsa Twees”

Soon Liz was following Williams footprints!
William disappeared to the world saving any
mass hysteria for now.



A couple minutes of walking and William
stopped again feeling strange.
Once more the brief glow returned and faded.
William started to grow again.


Bigger and bigger William swelled!
Taller and taller!
The tree tops got closer.

A couple minutes and William had stopped
growing at 70 feet tall, twice his previous size.


“HeeHee unny ickle back feel gud”

William stood there for a few minutes looking
around.
13555512111.title: A wandering big Willy- reserved-

choices: William Large is at large - reserved-
135555121111.content:
William Li - toddler
Wanda’s baby brother
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x6ty27...

https://www.thewatchcartoononline.tv/the...

———-

https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...

——

William stood there for a few minutes looking
around.

The ground felt cool to the barefoot 70
foot tall tot.
Suddenly William had to pee.
He looked around

“Potty!”

Unfortunately there was none.
Taking a lead from a male babysitter he
had a few times William pulled down his
shorts then his training diaper
and then watered the woods or a least
a few of the nearest trees.


He took a couple minutes then finished
up and pulled back up his garments.


Now he was thirsty again but oddly not hungry
or even sleepy not that it registered to
his young mind.

“Firsty wan dwink”

William then remembered there was a small lake
through these woods.


William resumes his walk for the 1st time
since growing 70 feet tall.
Fortunately the soft ground muffled his steps
quite a bit but even so every bare foot fall
made a thump.


His footprints were even bigger now.
The ground and trees even shook a bit
with each step.


William took things slow.
Not only was this his 1st time being in
these woods alone but he didn’t exactly
remember the way.

Plus he wasn’t sure why but things looked
different to him now but not like before
the woods. He didn’t grasp it was a difference
in relative perspectives where 15 minutes or
so ago some things looked “small”

Here many things stood bigger than him.



Slowly he lumbered through the forest.
Finally he reached the lake shore.
On one side where he was was the woods,
On the other ironically was an actual
forest bigger than the woods and
past those woods unknown to William or
Liz was another town larger than their own.


Liz was still a bit behind William tailing him!

Willam stood looking at the lake.


Back with Wanda and the class they realized the
bus was missing but had found it.
They were now back to normal size.
They head into the house to find William and
Liz missing.


“Oh no where is William?
Mom is gonna kill me”

“Relax Wanda maybe Liz took him out back”
said Ralph.


They head out back to see an empty yard
but some concerning evidence.



“Oh no please don’t tell me that what I
think happened did happen” said Wanda.


“Well look at it this way Wanda
looks like now William is your BIG Brother”
joked Ralph.


To which I’m classic fashion many groaned
“RALPHIE”


“Hmm I thought that the “Port-A-Shrinker”
was acting weirder than ever when William
stepped on it”


“Miss Frizzle this is serious! I know you
always tell us take chances, make mistakes
and get messy but this mess might be way too
big to handle”


“Hmm I see your dilemma!
Unfortunately I dunno if I can fix the
“Port-A-Shrinker” or if it’ll be effective enough!
I do however have an idea using the bus.
The rest of you will need to find William”


With that Mizz Frizzle left with the bus in a rush.
The class followed the trail presumably left
by William.

Arnold grumbled about how he shoulda
stayed home today!



Back at the lake Willam bent down and began
to drink the lake water.
A good 5 minutes later of gulping down water
and noticeably lower water levels ,
William’s thirst was quenched again.


Curious about the next bunch of trees and beyond
William walks around the lake and enters
the thicker slightly darker and larger forest.


The soil in the forest pretty much resembled
the smaller woods.
The trees did too tho a few were larger than
in the woods.
Practically all the trees here were between
80 and 200 feet tall.
Still Willam at 70 feet tall for now proceeded
into the denser larger forest.




Like with the smaller wood each step the
giant William took left an audible thump
, a large footprint about 10 inches deep and
causes the plus trees to shake a little.


As Liz gave chase and the class behind.
The class was shocked how much had actually
happened today and it wasn’t even 11am yet.
Then again they had just gotten to Wanda’s
Around 7am.



Slowly William wandered through the forest.
About 1/3 or the way in William had stopped.
Liz noticed it had been a while since
William last grew but knew better than to
get excited too soon.


In truth what neither Liz, the class or anyone
noticed is now at the point his growth
spurts were getting bigger because he was
doubling in size his growth spurts were slowly
getting further apart.


Now however as William stood stopped
a familiar brief glow then feelings struck.
William again started to grow again.
Perhaps the shift in time between spurts
was also in part because his bigger spurts
took longer to complete.


4 minutes and 1 growth spurt later
Willam was now 150 feet tall.
At last he was taller than a good portion of
trees in the forest yet still they hid him
well enough.


This new change would be short lived as
once again William had to pee.
Like before he’d go along the trees but
this time the pressure actually did some
damage to the ground and some trees
and the volume created a mini pond.



William didn’t notice and finished his business.
Moving on Willam resumes his walk and
exploration.
This time even with the soft ground
Willam’s steps were leaving way louder
thuds bordering on needing another word
to describe them.


The ground trembled more than ever as
did the trees.
His larger footprints were now 4 feet deep
in the soft soil.



Back in the woods the class came across
Willam’s 1st stop.


“Phew that pee smells strong!
What does your family feed William!”
commented Ralph and Carlosx
135555121111.title: A wandering big Willy - Part 2- reserved-

1355551214.content:
https://magicschoolbus.fandom.com/wiki/W...
—-
A/N - I decided to do an unclothed take on this
too
——-

Liz looked nervous but obeyed and followed
after William.


Suddenly Liz noticed William glow.
Then he grew clothes and all 6 inches taller
and larger keeping the same proportions
all over.


“HeeHee ickle feel gud”

Liz got nervous and ran panicked to try and
tell the class what happened.
The class was now in the bathroom looking
for things to help them get out of the house in
their shrunken state.


Unfortunately the class couldn’t understand
Liz’s panicked miming.
Liz rushed back to Willam in time to see
him spill something on himself.


Then Liz noticed Willam glow and
swell in size this time by a foot taller.
Liz noticed Willam’s clothes looked tighter.


Just then his mom came in having finished
a series of calls.
It was only 730 AM but immediately his mother
noticed the mess.

“Oh my William you need cleaned up!
Come on Liz I dunno where Wanda stepped
off to but we need to give my little boy a
bath.”


Liz tried miming to her but mother’s concern
was taking priority.
She picked him up somehow oblivious to his
changes and took him to the bathroom.


The class heard them coming and hid.
William’s mom began to unclothe him and
start the bath water.

“Huh that’s odd? Your clothes seem small!
Oh my we might need to buy you some new
zones soon. Kids these days you all sure
do grow up fast”


Liz facepalmed!

“Mommy’s little boy is gonna be mommy’s
big boy before I know it huh?
Just don’t grow up too fast on me now.
Your big sister Wanda has already done that”


William giggled
“HeeHee IG OY IG OY”

His mom finally got his clothes off.

“Yes that’s right my little Will is gonna
be a big strong boy before I know it”


“IG OY IG OY”

Then her phones started ringing like crazy
again. She stopped the running tub and
sat William in the water.


“Liz I’m gonna need you to watch
William and hopefully Wanda will take
over soon”


With that she left.

The class came out and Liz rushed to them.

“Oh great now we gotta watch William while
we’re small” said Ralphie.


Fortunately William was enjoying his time
in the tub for awhile so there didn’t seem to
be much to do for them at least not until the
class saw what Liz had tried tellin them.


William felt strange and began to glow.
The class noticed.

“Hey look William is.. Glowing” said
Dorothy Ann.

Liz looked distraught and mined her panic.
The glow faded after about 30 seconds but
the class was shocked.


Willam began growing larger again.
This time he swelled to the height of the
siblings mother then stopped.


“Oh no Willam is growing” panicked Wanda


“Well your mom did say he was gonna grow
big but I guess this was faster than expected”
said Ralphie


“Gives new meanin to the phrase growing
boy huh” joked Carlos.


“This is serious” said Wanda.

“But how” asked Phoebe


“Do you know Mizz Frizzle” asked D.A.


“I was afraid of this. It was the Port-A-Shrinker”
said Frizzle.


“But isn’t it supposed to -gulp- ya know only
shrink and grow to normal” asked Arnold



“Normally yes but when Willam damage it
whatever he did must’ve temporarily shorted
it out or something and made into a
Port-A-Grower instead” reasoned Phoebe.



“Correct-A-Mundo” said Frizzle


“Oh my at my old school little brothers and
sisters weren’t suddenly grown big”


Soon the 5 1/2 foot toddler noticed the class
and his sister.

“Izzle, Anda whiddle! Me IG OY”


“Uh oh” said Arnold.


“No Willam we need to get us normal
and shrink you back”

The mischievous yet happy tyke didn't
agree but that’s also because he didn’t
truly grasp the situation as he stood up!

“NO INK ME IG OY”

William got out of the bath taking full advantage
of his new height.
He left the bathroom in his birthday suit
without a care.


“Uh oh I don’t think William likes that plan
and we’re too small to stop him” said Ralph.


“I knew I should’ve stayed home today”
said Arnold.


Shockingly William went to the kitchen and
grabbed a bag which he filled with a good
amount of food and drinks from the fridge.


As the shrunken class gave chase.
They got to the kitchen in time to see
Willam go out the backyard door.


As he stepped out still in the buff they
noticed him glow then grow again
this time to 10 feet tall.

It was then that he actually felt hungry
and thirsty.

“Hungwy and firsty”

He sat down with his raided goods from the
kitchen fridge and ate and drank.

He pulled out 4 apple juice boxes and
made quick work of them.

Next he pulled out a jug of chocolate
milk and downed that.


Next William chugged a gallon of OJ
then cranberry juice.
Next William found a couple baby bottles
of milk and a couple of baby formula and
finished those off.

Lastly he had 2 bottles of water.

His thirst quenched next was food!
He ate an entire 6 pack of chocolate pudding!


He ate 2 jars of Apple sauce, a container
of cottage cheese, half a chocolate cake,
2 things of baby food, a slice of pie, and
a couple of brownies.

Satisfied William was now back to his
curious self and felt the urge to explore.
1355551214.title: Outgrowing cothes - Authors choice

1355552.content: Hmm, is it Rugrats then?

to the size Ray from Rugrats?

choices: Forget shrinking! Angelica wants to be BIG
135555212.content: She finds it in her Uncle Stu's workshop, him having invented one, to make it easier to carry heavy things from one place to another if shrunk?
135555212.title: Angelica

135555215.content: It's Susie who finds it?

13555523.title: Other choices.

135555235.content: How about Kim Possible? Lots of gadgets in that show, surprised a size ray was never considered.
135555235.title: Another cartoons show

choices: Let's make the little tyke large!
1355552351.content:
So who's gonna enjoy getting huge?


Hana Stoppable - Baby
Ron's adopted super ninja baby sister
https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Hana_Stop...

https://youtu.be/AwIMx1--3O0
1355552351.title: Kim Possible it is!

choices: Wade calls in with a mission
13555523511.content:
It was just another day for Ron Stoppable, which usually meant a trip to Bueno Nacho, a few quality hours spent with his bon diggety girlfriend, the one and only Kim Possible, and taking care of his adopted baby sister Hana, the world's cutest and sweetest little kid you ever did see...as far as he was concerned, anyway. Now, that wasn't always the case, in fact he hated the idea of having her around at first. She was...an intruder. His old bedroom had been converted into her nursery, and now he lived in the attic which his parents had turned into a room for him.

But those paternal instincts kicked in eventually, she was just too darn cute to resist. And as the months wore on, she began to learn and grow and reach milestones at an astonishing rate. The term gifted, child prodigy would be a good way of putting it. She had already started learning words thanks to Ron's dedication to teaching her, and she was already quite the little athlete...of course, that probably had more to do with being a mystical ninja baby from the secret Yamanouchi Ninja School than anything.

Still, Ron was determined to do everything he could to help her become the best at pretty much everything. His brotherly love for her ran so deep, and seeing her smile was like a light in the high school senior's life. Life really couldn't be better for him.

Now for those who knew Ron, which Kim Possible most certainly did, since they'd been best friends since high school and now were dating...it was no secret that Ron tended to obsess over things. When Hana first arrived, he was obsessed with proving that the bag of flour he was supposed to take care of for his health class assignment was far superior to Hana. Then his next obsession was to teach her to turn a page in a book, as well as maybe dance along with a music video DVD for toddlers...which Kim wondered if Ron enjoyed more than Hana herself.

His latest obsession? Making sure Hana grew up big and strong.

In health class, they were currently doing a crash course in how the human body develops from infancy all the way to adulthood. Which got Ron wondering about Hana. The last thing he wanted was for Hana to fall behind her peers. If anything, he would prefer for her to be ahead of them, the best and biggest of the whole baby bunch! So it was that every day for the past 2 weeks, Ron was measuring Hana to see if she'd grown at all. Hana, bless her, was oblivious as to what her big brother was doing, all she knew was that he loved her and took care of her, and she loved him dearly for it. Whenever big brother was around, everything would be ok.

"I'm telling you Kim, Han's almost a year old and she's only 2-foot-3. According to Japanese averages, a girl her age should be at least 2-foot-4!" Ron exclaimed into his cellphone as he measured Hana yet again. "She's below average KP! And I will not stand for it!"

From her room in her own house, Kim rolled her eyes as she listened to her boyfriend rant. "Not everyone grows at the same rate Ron. It took you until last year to finally pass me up in height, and you're still getting taller now...which I will admit, is a nice little bonus for me."

"Nice try Kim, but I'm not getting distracted by your feminine flirtations!" Ron declared as he let Hana go and she crawled away to play with Rufus, his pet naked mole rat. "It's my duty as her big brother to do everything I can to help her not only catch up, but surpass her peers! No sister of mine is going to be below average!"

"Ron, don't go off the deep end with this."

"Relax, I'm not gonna stretch her out or anything. I'm just gonna do a little research and see what I can do to encourage her growth is all. I would never do anything to hurt her!"

"I'm not saying you will, but you need to keep in mind that just because she's literally one inch shorter than average doesn't mean she's not healthy." Then Kim heard her parents calling for her. "Gotta go Ron, remember what I said."

"Yeah, I hear ya. Do what you gotta do, love ya KP."

"Love you too Ron."

As Ron hung up the phone, he scooped Hana up in his arms, and the little tyke giggled and wrapped her arms around Ron's neck. "Don't you worry kiddo, your big brother's gonna make sure you grow up big and strong. Now let's see if there's anything we can find to help give you a size boost!"
13555523511.title: Let's make the little tyke large!

choices: Hana captured as a test subject
The mission goes fairly well but Hana was unknowingly zapped
135555235112.content:
Suddenly Wade calls in with a mission
and Ron winds up having to bring
Hana along.
135555235112.title: Wade calls in with a mission

choices: Nothing has happened yet, back to routine
1355552351122.content:
As soon as Wade called in with a mission to check out a rocky mountain lair that he detected suspicious activity in, Ron felt the urge to bang his head against a wall. The times he was put between a rock and a hard place was more than he could count, and his mother had made it abundantly clear that Hana was not to go along on missions with him and Kim. Of course...there was that whole recon loophole...it wasn't like Ron had much of a choice. His parents were away for an actuary conference in Denver, and they wouldn't be back until late the next day. And leaving Hana alone was just not gonna happen, super ninja baby or not.

"Well Han, looks like we're gonna have to take you on another mission."

"Hrk, bad idea." Rufus chittered.

"Don't I know it? But it's not like I can hire a babysitter! I AM the babysitter! Plus I'm not gonna leave Hana to some stranger, what kind of a brother would I be if I did that?"

So it was with great reluctance that Ron packed up the baby bag, strapped Hana into the baby carrier, and with Kim driving, they were on their way before they knew it.

Upon arrival to the location, the first thing they noticed was that the lair's roof had collapsed for some reason, and the building seemed completely demolished. "Wade, you sure this is the right place?" Kik asked.

From the car's built in console, Wade nodded. "No doubt about it Kim, that's where the energy signature's coming from."

"Dude, this place looks condemned!" Ron exclaimed. "Or...maybe haunted..."

"I'm calling a definite maybe on the first, definite no on the second. Let's check it out." Kim led the way inside, as the teen heroes (plus one baby and one naked mole rat) were met with more debris and wires hanging from the ceiling. "Whatever happened here, it must've been big."

"Or the football team had another one of their wild nights here." Ron suddenly felt Kim's eyes on him. "N-Not that I would know! Because I don't go to those!"

"Right, because the star running back never gets invited."

"Well I do, but y'know, why spend the night getting drunk and breaking stuff when I can spend the night with the most beautilicious girl in the whole wide universe?"

Kim smirked. "Good answer." They continued on their way, and they soon found themselves standing in the middle of a massive room, more trashed than the rest...but the real attention getter was the giant ray gun in the middle of the room, sparking with wires hanging out of it. "Well that doesn't look evil at all." Kim scoffed as she activated her wrist Kimmunicator. "Wade, think we found your energy signature."

"I'd say you did." Wade said as he furiously typed away on his keyboard. "It'll take me a minute to figure out what it was designed to do."

"Man, this thing is huge!" Ron said as he walked around the ray.

"Ron, don't touch anything!"

"C'mon Kim, don't you think I know better by now?" Ron rolled his eyes as he leaned against the ray's main console. "Every time I push a button, something explodes. Well this time I'm completely hands off!"

Unfortunately, Hana was not, as the little tyke strapped to Ron's back was taken in by the big red button in the middle of the console, and with Ron leaning back, she was able to reach it and press it, and the machine began to whir to life, causing Hana to giggle.

"Ron!"

"I swear! I didn't press anything!"

Then Kim saw Hana pressing the button over and over again, and she groaned as she grabbed Ron's hand and pulled him away. "But it looks like Hana is picking up your Stoppable curiosity!"

"Oh..."

"Uh, Kim," Wade exclaimed nervously. "According to my readings, that thing's gearing up to fire!"

"Everyone down!" Kim shoved Ron to the floor and then dropped herself, just as the ray fired and a bright green laser whizzed just inches over their heads. "Did anyone get hit by that?"

"Don't think so..." Ron said as he slowly got back up. "Rufus?"

The naked mole rat chattered and gave a quick thumbs up.

"And what about Hana?" Kim asked.

Ron took off the harness to get a better look at his baby sister, and she seemed no worse for wear as she was still smiling wide eyed at him. "She doesn't seem hurt or anything, are ya Han?"

"Brudder!" She giggled.

"Phew...that's a relief." Ron sighed. Then an alarm began blaring, and Ron shrieked. "What's happening?!"

"Self destruct!" Kim shouted. "Everyone out!" As Kim dragged everyone out at full sprint, the ray blew up just as they made it to the doors, and they managed to escape unscathed. "That does it. Ron, you know I love your sister, but from now on, if she's with you, I'm going solo."

"Yeah, might be for the best."

"Wade, did you get anything?"

"Sorry Kim, it blew before I could finish my scan. But I'll see what I can dig up and try to fill in the blanks."

Kim hung up, and as soon as everyone was safely strapped in, she drove her boyfriend and his baby sister home. "I hope Hana's okay."

"Heh, you kidding? I think this kid's a thrill seeker. Takes after you I think."

"Well hopefully not too much like me. I'll call you later."

"Yeah, later KP." Ron watched Kim drive next door to her house, and then he went back inside to wind down after the mission. "Man, that was too close. Guess we better get you all changed and ready for bed, huh kiddo?" Ron carried the tyke upstairs to get her all cleaned up.

Completely unaware that while he had narrowly missed getting hit by the ray...Hana actually wound up getting hit instead.
1355552351122.title: Babies and Evil Labs don't mix

choices: Hana doubled in size! Ron’s reaction
Tall tyke! Hana tripled in size overnight
Unpleasant unexpected morning wake up call! Hana is outgrowing the house!
Hana missing? What’s with the earthquakes outside? Godzilla sized sis!
13555523511221.content:
Not only were Ron, Wade, and Kim
unaware that Hana was hit by the ray, but
also they were unaware what happened at
Drakken’s destroyed lab or that the ray
had multiple side effects depending on the target.



Later that night while Ron and Hana are
sleeping Hana begins to glow the same color
as the ray that zapped her.

She and Ron slept through this occurrence.
Slowly however as she slept in her crib
Hana begins to swell in size.

The next morning ____
13555523511221.title: Hana begins to grow overnight

choices: Ron goes to get Hana her breakfast
Kim comes over to see how Ron's doing
Hana has a growth spurt while Ron gets breakfast
135555235112215.content:
As Ron woke up from his slumber - with a little help from Rufus of course, by means of bouncing on his face...

"Ow! Alright, I'm up!"

The sandy-haired blond made his way downstairs, blinking several times as he tried to shake off the drowsiness. Last night's scare really wore him out, but now he had to get back to normal, and the first thing he had to do was measure his baby sister. One little distraction was rarely ever enough to shake him off from his obsession. When he reached the nursery, he already saw Hana in her onesie, and she was running circles around the ceiling. "Aww." Rufus cooed.

"Yeah, it's cute, until you have to clean the footprints off the ceiling." He waited for the opportune moment, and then leaped up and snagged her before she could make another lap around the room. "Gotcha you little troublemaker!" He tickled her belly, and she laughed joyfully and squirmed in his cradling arm. "You know what time it is, let's see if anything's changed!" As they made their way into the kitchen where Ron was doing the measurements, he stood her up against the wall, helping her to stay steady. "How is it you can jump 50 feet in the air, defeat an ancient evil mystic monkey, run around the ceiling like a race car around a track...and yet if I don't help you stand up, you fall over?"

Naturally Hana had no idea what he was talking about, but he was making a funny face so she laughed and reached for him with her tiny hands. "Brudder!"

"That's right Han, big brother's here to help you get big. Now let's see what we got here..." As Ron made the measurement, in-between Hana squirming, he was finally able to make the mark, and his eyes widened when he saw where it landed this time. "Whoa! For real?!" Just to be sure, he measured her again...and then a third time...and each time, there was no mistake. "Rufus, ruler me!"

With a tiny salute, the naked mole rat scampered off and returned moments later with a ruler which Ron quickly took.

"Thanks buddy!" As he put the ruler against the wall to see the difference between the marks, a huge grin spread across his face as he saw just how much of a spurt she had. "Booyah Han!" He exclaimed as he picked her up and held her high in the air while spinning in circles, the girl laughing the entire time. "2-foot-7! That's a whole 4 inches of growth! Now you're above average! All the other babies are gonna think you're a giant! You'll be like...the queen baby."

"Hrk, ho boy." Rufus rolled his naked mole rat eyes.

"Although..." Ron stopped spinning and thought for a moment. "I did only look up the average size for Japanese babies...I wonder what the average size is for American babies..." Ron held Hana out at arm's length to get a full look at her, as she kicked and squirmed in his grip playfully. "Why stop there? You're already the world's cutest baby. Let's see if you can be the world's biggest baby! Nothing but the best for my baby sister!"
135555235112215.title: Slow and Steady - Above Average Han

choices: Breakfast goes by with no incident
Hana's starting to look uncomfortable in her chair...
1355552351122152.content:
Just then the front door opened, and Kim's voice echoed through the house. "Ron, you awake yet?"

"You bet KP!" Ron grinned widely and slid into the room, Hana still safely nestled in his arms. "A bon diggity morning to you my lady!" He said as he swiftly moved in to kiss her on the cheek. "Hope your day's off to as great a start as mine!"

For Kim's part, she just put her hand to her cheek with a shocked laugh. "Wow, what's got you in such a good mood this early?"

"Well I have some good news to share with you today KP! In a stunning turn of events, our dear little Han isn't quite so little anymore!" He stretched out his arms to put Hana up to Kim's face, and the girl giggled and squirmed in his grip. "Seemingly overnight, my below-average baby sister has become an above-average 4 inches taller! And I even triple-checked the measurement to be sure!"

Kim just blinked, her smile gone as she processed what Ron said. "Well...that's...great Ron. I guess."

"You guess? This is the best thing ever!" Ron exclaimed. "Hana deserves nothing but the best, and that means I need to do everything I can to make her become the best she can be!"

"Ron," Kim rolled her eyes. "This is starting to remind me of the turning the page situation. Not everything with Hana has to be a step towards progress. Have you ever considered just letting her be her and letting her figure things out on her own?"

C'mon Kim, does she look unhappy to you?" Ron held Hana out to her again, and this time the baby reached her arms out for Kim to hold her, which Kim accepted as she took Hana from him. "Far as I can tell, that's one happy kid."

The redheaded cheerleader looked down at Hana, who was looking up at her with wide, innocent eyes. "She looks as happy as ever." Kim admitted with a small smile. "All I'm saying is don't go off the deep end. Just love her as your sister, not as a personal project. We don't need more Sacky incidents."

Ron frowned and stared distantly at nothing, the flashbacks of all the poor innocent bags of flour that perished by his hands. "Oh Sacky MCMXXXIII, how could you betray me so?"

"Oh no." Kim sighed hopelessly. "You and your Roman numerals. You wouldn't have gotten caught with a bag of sugar instead of flour if you had just let the stupid thing sit in a corner for your assignment. Barkin wouldn't have known any better."

"First of all, Sacky wasn't stupid! I loved her as much as I've loved anything...second, never assume Barkin doesn't know something." His voice lowered hauntingly. "He always knows...somehow."

Kim started to walk past Ron into his kitchen, with her blond boyfriend following closely behind. "You should've just explained to Mr. Barkin what happened. In fact I bet if you'd just brought Hana into school instead of the flour, you might've gotten an "A" just because you had to take care of a real baby instead of a fake one."

"Aww man, now ya tell me!"

Kim shook her head with an exasperated smile, then placed Hana into her booster seat as she grabbed a chair for herself. "Alright, enough about the past. Let's talk about right now. What's for breakfast?"

At the thought of cooking, Ron immediately perked up. "For you, me and Rufus, Le Ron Omelette, filled with freshly grated cheddar, ham, bell peppers and onions." Ron zipped over to the fridge, grabbing the ingredients necessary for his delicacy. "And for my growing baby sister, a sippy cup of breast milk to start, then we'll experiment with a few new fruits she hasn't tried yet."

Now Kim was shocked. "Breast milk?! How-"

"I don't know how my mom gets it," Ron gave Kim a serious look. "And I don't want to know either."

Kim put her hands up. "Point made."

"Thank you." Ron then handed the sippy cup to Hana, and the girl eagerly began to drink it down. "There ya go! Now you drink it all up, wouldn't want you to miss out on any of those nutrients! We'll have you growing taller in no time!"
1355552351122152.title: Kim comes over to see how Ron's doing

choices: Hana keeps growing without anyone seeing
13555523511221522.content:
As Ron continued to bustle around the kitchen, preparing breakfast for him and his lady, Hana quickly finished the cup of breast milk, and moments later, she began to fuss, whining and struggling from her chair, which gained her some attention.

"Ron, how tight did you make the high chair?"

"Uh, about the same as always, why?"

Kim got up from her chair to address the squirming child's problem, and saw that the restraints keeping Hana in the chair were squeezing her tightly. "Ron! She's practically got no room to breathe!" Scoffing, Kim loosened the chair to give Hana more space, and almost instantly she calmed down and reached out to Kim. "There you go kiddo," Kim smiled as she took Hana's hands in her own. "Ron wasn't kidding, you really are getting big."

"Thanks to her loving big brother of course!" Ron grinned as he presented Kim with her omelette. "Now you take this and get started while I get Han something else to snack on." As Ron handed off the plate of eggs, he went over to Hana and took the empty sippy cup and replaced it with a plastic bowl of small banana slices. "There ya go Han, a terrific breakfast appetizer. If you still want more after, I'll even make you some scrambled eggs! After all, babies need plenty of protein to grow up big and strong!"

"Let no one doubt your paternal instincts Ron," Kim rolled her eyes as she started on her breakfast. Almost immediately, her annoyance faded as the flavors of her boyfriend's food took control of her senses. "This is amazing, as usual."

"I got one great pitch KP, and I intend to use it as long as it keeps working!"

"Just make sure it stays a healthy pitch. We don't need another Bueno Nacho fiasco."

"I thought we agreed to never speak of that again?"

"No, you asked me not to speak of it again. I never said I wouldn't."

While the two lovers bantered back and forth, Hana smiled as she munched on her banana slices. Between bites, unbeknownst to the two teenagers in the room...Hana would coo as a warm sensation coursed through her young body. With each bite of food, Hana was spurting slightly bigger...her onesie starting to stretch to its absolute limit, as the sleeves began to squeeze around her wrists and the fabric around her feet began to show signs of tearing.

Of course, Hana had no way of comprehending what was happening to her, being less than a year old. But what she did know was that she was starting to feel tied down again, as the high chair was once more becoming too restrictive for her growing body.
13555523511221522.title: Big Baby, Small Seat

choices: Ron doesn't notice Hana's growth spurt
Hana's about to burst out of the high chair!
Hana was gone but not for long!  8 foot tall. Hana
Hana was gone but not for long! The Earthquake and House Sized Hana!
135555235112215222.content:
While Hana's size increased, the two teens were suddenly distracted by the beeping of the Kimmunicator on Kim's wrist once again. "Can't I even have breakfast anymore without the world being in danger?" Kim sighed and answered the call. "Hey Wade, what's the sitch?"

"Sorry for interrupting, but your dad wanted me to patch him through."

"Dad?" Kim's eyes widened slightly. "Go ahead Wade." Seconds later, Dr. James Timothy Possible's face replaced the tech guru's. "What's up Dad?"

"Kimmie-Cub, I know you're trying to enjoy your weekend, but I could really use your help with your brothers today!" Dr. Possible suddenly ducked a stray bottle rocket, followed shortly by the frantic apologies of Kim's younger twin brothers. "Can you at least come over and help get things under control?"

"I'll be right there." Kim sighed and hung up, sadly eyeing her half-finished breakfast. "Duty calls Ron."

"I hear ya KP, do what you gotta do. We're not goin' anywhere." Ron watched his girlfriend bolt from the house, leaving him, Rufus and Hana alone. "Welp, guess I better start cleaning up. No chef worth his salt would leave the kitchen dirtier than he started." He grabbed the plates and headed towards the sink, taking a quick glance at Hana before he got there.

info.brief_description: A girl or someone of your choosing finds or comes into contact with a size change device!
info.description:
Based off of a similarly named interactive
( Mysterious Shrink Ray )


You, a character you choose or create
Find a size change device or come in
contact with one and Hijinks ensue!


Rules / Guidelines / Guidance

1 - NO MALE GIANTS
( exceptions permitted in case by case basis )
( permitted example might include a giant baby )

2 - Shrinking males, shrinking girls or growing
girls ( Giantess / GTS ) strongly preferred!

3 - Decent grammar/English please!

4 - character age ranges preferred are
ages 2 to 18

5 - Limit nudity/sex etc to a bare minimum

6 - no scat

7 - limit vore

8 - I reserve the right to add / edit / remove
chapters or rules

9 - have fun and most anything goes
